news.content:
ðŸ’¬ Recent Interviews & Discussions for the Team


In case you missed it:


Weynand appeared on the UAE Tech Podcast to explain how ThreeFold works in layman's terms and the importance of a "People's Internet."


Sacha joined Mainstay Digital to discuss how ThreeFold is doing to the Internet what Bitcoin did to money.


& Scott sat down with Kyle Ellicott to talk about the farmer's journey and the expansion of the ThreeFold Grid.
news.excerpt: Check out some recent interviews and discussions around ThreeFold, decentralization, and farming.

next.title: Limited L2 Validator Spots Remain
next.excerpt: Sign up for one of the limited L2 validator spots remaining and play a crucial role in the future of ThreeFold!
